alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 11:16AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1114 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Neptune Beach, or near Jacksonville Beach, drifting west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Objects on the beaches may be blow around. Waterspouts are possible. Locations impacted include... Neptune Beach, jacksonville Beach, Little Talbot Island, Isle of Palms, and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is possible with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
